intro.dialog: It's a little messy right now, but I'm working on that.
I'm thinking of decorating the place with a theme.|!| Maybe you can help me with that?

request_single_theme.dialog: Do you have any |C3|[VAL1] gifts|C0| you'd want to trade?

request_double_theme.dialog: I'll trade you for any |C3|[VAL1] gifts|C0| that you don't need.
I think |C3|[VAL2] gifts|C0| would also fit my style.

reject_none.dialog: I'd also take anything else you have to trade.

reject_one.dialog: I'd take anything else, but I do think |C4|[VAL3] gifts|C0| would clash with my vision, so I don't want any of those.

comment_trade.dialog: You can have any of these.

comment_want1.dialog: I want |C3|[VAL1] gifts,|C0| but I'll also take anything else.

comment_want2.dialog: I'll take anything, but I really want |C3|[VAL1] gifts|C0| or |C3|[VAL2] gifts.|C0|

comment_reject1.dialog: I want |C3|[VAL1] gifts,|C0| but I'll take anything that isn't a |C4|[VAL3] gift.|C0|

comment_reject2.dialog: I want |C3|[VAL1] gifts|C0| or |C3|[VAL2] gifts,|C0| but I'll take anything that isn't a |C4|[VAL3] gift.|C0|

comment_leave.dialog: Let me know when you want to leave.

comment_closed.dialog: I've given you everything I have to give.

comment_give_limit.dialog: You've given me enough for today.|L|Now I have to figure out how to arrange them.

comment_burden_limit.dialog: I'm so happy you are here right now.

comment_blue_special.dialog: My dearest Defect, I insist that we help her in some way before we go.

comment_take_normal.dialog: I think you would like this one.

comment_take_unknown.dialog: It's covered in frost, and I can't tell what it is. Sorry about that.

comment_take_over.dialog: I actually want to keep that one for now.

comment_quick_limit.dialog: You don't have any room for this.

gift_taken.dialog_rand1: A lovely decoration for your heart.
gift_taken.dialog_rand2: You should put it in your castle.
gift_taken.dialog_rand4: I know you will find the perfect place for this.

comment_give_normal.dialog: I could take this if you don't want it.

comment_give_special.dialog: This would absolutely fit the theme of my castle.

comment_give_dislike.dialog: This clashes with how I'm imagining the theme of my castle.

comment_give_quick.dialog: This would be gone before I could even find a place for it.

comment_give_burden.dialog: ...Sorry I was just thinking about something.

comment_give_taken.dialog: I just gave that to you.

comment_give_starter.dialog: This defines your style too much for me to accept it.

gift_given.dialog_rand1: I think I can find a place for this.
gift_given.dialog_rand2: I can make this work with the theme.
gift_given.dialog_rand3: This will always remind me of you.
gift_given.dialog_rand4: I'll figure out a place to put this.

special_given.dialog_rand1: This will fit my theme perfectly!
special_given.dialog_rand2: This is exactly what I wanted!
special_given.dialog_rand3: I was looking for something like this!

special_given.dialog_rand1: I know exactly where to put it.
special_given.dialog_rand2: I know just the place for it.
special_given.dialog_rand3: This will bring all my decorations together.
special_given.dialog_rand4: My vision is really coming together.

blessing_given.dialog: I don't know what just happened, but I suddenly feel very inspired.

to_burden.dialog: Why are you looking at me like that?
Is there something in my eye?

burden_taken.dialog: What did you just do to me?
I suddenly feel a lot better!

veyeral_taken.dialog: I just realized that I suddenly worry for all of my sisters.
I didn't really care much about them, and I don't think they cared for me either.
We only cared about ourselves and our own loneliness.
But now I just want us all to be happy together.

BDN_blizz_veyeral_taken.dialog: My sisters and I always feel alone.
Well, I used to feel so alone.
I had hoped that this could become a home for all of us.
Or at least the ones who want to be here.
They will always be welcome here no matter what happens.

BDN_the_void_taken.dialog: I wonder how mother really feels about us?
You can help her too, right?

leave_blank.dialog: No matter how you decide to decorate this place, it will look beautiful.
I know this because I've seen it in your dreams.
You will always be welcome at my castle!

leave_defect.dialog: This castle is well on it's way to absolute perfection.
But it will never be as perfect as your castle.
|wave|You are my perfect castle, My Defect.
Blue, what does that even mean?

leave_twins.dialog: You're really going to just leave without giving her a hug?

leave_devil.dialog: Also some chains would look righteous hanging from this side.
Oh! And you can put a guitar rack over here!
I think those might look better in your castle.

leave_default.dialog: You are always welcome at my castle!
